courses.title: Single Variable Calculus
courses.description: Differentiation and integration of functions of one variable.

courses.title: Multivariable Calculus
courses.description: Calculus of functions of several variables.

courses.title: Linear Algebra
courses.description: Matrix theory, systems of equations, vector spaces.

courses.title: Studies in Algebra and Group Theory
courses.description: Harvard's honors abstract algebra sequence. Groups, rings, fields, and Galois theory.

courses.title: Studies in Real and Complex Analysis
courses.description: Harvard's honors analysis sequence. Measure theory, integration, complex analysis.

courses.title: Real Analysis
courses.description: Rigorous treatment of real number system, sequences, series, continuity.
